in_scope: RG-01: Navigate to 'My Reading Goals' page from user dashboard
RG-02: Set annual reading goal (positive integer)
RG-03: Display goal number and current progress count
RG-04: Increment progress count when book is marked as read
RG-05: Update progress display automatically or upon page refresh
RG-06: Edit/change saved goal number for current year
Browser compatibility testing for Chrome and Firefox latest versions
Basic UI/UX functionality and adherence to existing site styles
out_of_scope: Testing on browsers other than Chrome and Firefox (Safari, Edge, IE)
Extensive UI/UX redesign or usability testing

test_approach_summary.methodology: Manual testing based on requirements with test cases derived from functional specifications. Testing will follow a risk-based approach prioritizing core functionality first.

test_schedule.activity: Test Planning and Test Case Design
Functional Testing - Navigation and Goal Setting (RG-01, RG-02)
Functional Testing - Progress Display and Tracking (RG-03, RG-04, RG-05)

assumptions: Development will be completed and feature will be ready for testing by end of day on 2024-07-29
Test environment will be stable and configured with the same settings as production
Existing functionality for marking books as 'read' is working correctly
No major changes to requirements will occur during the testing period
risks: Delay in development completion could compress testing timeline
Integration issues with existing 'mark as read' functionality may require additional testing time
Defects found late in the testing cycle may not have sufficient time for fixes and verification
Limited browser scope may miss compatibility issues with other browsers used by some users
